name: fox soldier
detailed_description:
The Queen saved you and transformed you into a powerful mechanical warrior.The mysterious and glamorous queen is the driving force for your advancement and battle.Conquer the world in the name of the Queen.
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Use the various weapons and resources available to defeat powerful monsters, and faith makes you fearless! Clear every level, let every corner of the world shout the Queen's name!
about_the_game:
The Queen saved you and transformed you into a powerful mechanical warrior.The mysterious and glamorous queen is the driving force for your advancement and battle.Conquer the world in the name of the Queen.
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Use the various weapons and resources available to defeat powerful monsters, and faith makes you fearless! Clear every level, let every corner of the world shout the Queen's name!
short_description: "FOXSOLDIER" is a 3D shooting action game launched by Yousoi Co.,Ltd. It is specially developed for game consoles and mainframes. It adopts full-view mode. As a warrior of the Queen of the planet of Metis, in order to get the Queen's love, you must go through difficult battles, conquer the world, and destroy monsters and...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
